original: @62a # // rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: @62a # // rgya gar skad du /
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: shr'i krishna ya m'a ri s'a dha nam n'a ma /
analyzed: shr'i krishna ya m'a ri s'a dha nam n'a ma /
translated: Śrī-kṛṣṇa-yamāri-sādhana-nāma

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /
translated: In Tibetan:

original: dpal gshin rje gshed nag po sgrub pa'i thabs zhes bya ba /
analyzed: dpal gshin rje gshed nag po sgrub pa'i thabs zhes bya ba /
translated: The Means of Attaining the Glorious Black Slayer of the Lord of Death

original: dpal gshin rje gshed la phyag 'tshal lo //🔽gus pa yis ni bla ma yi //
analyzed: dpal gshin rje gshed la phyag 'tshal lo // gus pa yis ni bla ma yi //
translated: Homage to the glorious Slayer of the Lord of Death.🔽With devotion, I pay homage

original: zhabs kyi padmar phyag 'tshal te //
analyzed: zhabs kyi padmar phyag 'tshal te //
translated: at the lotus feet of the guru.

original: bla ma'i zhal snga'i bka' drin gyis //
analyzed: bla ma'i zhal snga'i bka' drin gyis //
translated: Through the kindness of the guru's face,🔽I will explain the concise means of attainment

original: nag po zhal gsum phyag drug pa'i //🔽mdor bsdus pa yi sgrub thabs bshad //
analyzed: nag po zhal gsum phyag drug pa'i // mdor bsdus pa yi sgrub thabs bshad //
translated: of the three-faced, six-armed Black One.

original: dang por rnal 'byor dbang phyug gis //
analyzed: dang por rnal 'byor dbang phyug gis //
translated: First, the lord of yogins

original: dben @62b pa'i gnas su 'dug nas ni //
analyzed: dben @62b pa'i gnas su 'dug nas ni //
translated: should go to an isolated place

original: stong pa'i sems la mnyam gzhag ste //
analyzed: stong pa'i sems la mnyam gzhag ste //
translated: and rest evenly in the mind of emptiness,

original: snying ga padma 'dab brgyad bsam //
analyzed: snying ga padma 'dab brgyad bsam //
translated: imagining an eight-petaled lotus at the heart.

original: de steng nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ro //
analyzed: de steng nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ro //
translated: Upon that is a sun maṇḍala,

original: de yi steng du h'um bsams te //
analyzed: de yi steng du h'um bsams te //
translated: upon which is a hūṃ.

original: h'um las 'od byung mdun du ni //
analyzed: h'um las 'od byung mdun du ni //
translated: Light from the hūṃ radiates out in front,

original: bla ma mkha' 'gro bzhugs par bsam //
analyzed: bla ma mkha' 'gro bzhugs par bsam //
translated: where one imagines the guru and ḍākinī.

original: phyag 'tshal ba dang mchod byas la //
analyzed: phyag 'tshal ba dang mchod byas la //
translated: One should pay homage and make offerings.

original: sdig bshags la sogs tshogs bcu bsag / de nas snying ga'i h'um las ni //
analyzed: sdig bshags la sogs tshogs bcu bsag / de nas snying ga'i h'um las ni //
translated: The ten accumulations, such as the confession of sins, and so forth,🔽and then light comes from the hūṃ at the heart,

original: 'od byung lus ngag bag chags rnams //
analyzed: 'od byung lus ngag bag chags rnams //
translated: and the body and speech habitual tendencies

original: bsregs nas stong pa nyid du bsgom //
analyzed: bsregs nas stong pa nyid du bsgom //
translated: are burned and meditated on as emptiness.

original: de ni ye shes tshogs yin no //
analyzed: de ni ye shes tshogs yin no //
translated: That is the accumulation of wisdom.

original: sems ni h'um gi rnam par bsam //
analyzed: sems ni h'um gi rnam par bsam //
translated: The mind is imagined in the form of a hūṃ,

original: h'um las rdo rje rtse lngar gyur //
analyzed: h'um las rdo rje rtse lngar gyur //
translated: and from the hūṃ a five-pronged vajra arises,

original: rdo rje las ni skur bskyed do //
analyzed: rdo rje las ni skur bskyed do //
translated: and from the vajra the body is generated.

original: zhal gsum phyag drug sku mdog nag / g-yas dkar g-yon dmar dbus mthing zhal //
analyzed: zhal gsum phyag drug sku mdog nag / g-yas dkar g-yon dmar dbus mthing zhal //
translated: The three faces are black, the right face is white, the left face is red, and the central face is blue.

original: spyan gsum mche ba gtsigs pa'i zhal //
analyzed: spyan gsum mche ba gtsigs pa'i zhal //
translated: The three eyes bare fangs.

original: dbu skra kham nag gyen du brdzes //
analyzed: dbu skra kham nag gyen du brdzes //
translated: The brown hair bristles upward.

original: rdo rje ral gri gri gug gsum //🔽g-yas pa yi ni phyag na bsnams //🔽'khor lo padma thod pa gsum //
analyzed: rdo rje ral gri gri gug gsum // g-yas pa yi ni phyag na bsnams // 'khor lo padma thod pa gsum //
translated: The three right hands hold a vajra, a sword, and a flaying knife.

original: g-yon gyi phyag na bsnams pa yi ;
analyzed: g-yon gyi phyag na bsnams pa yi ;
translated: The three left hands hold a chakram, a lotus, and a skull cup.

original: / g-yas bskum g-yon brkyang gsus po che //
analyzed: / g-yas bskum g-yon brkyang gsus po che //
translated: The right leg is bent, and the left leg is extended.

original: lha mo phag mos mgul nas 'khyud //🔽phag mo zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma //
analyzed: lha mo phag mos mgul nas 'khyud // phag mo zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma //
translated: The goddess Vārāhī embraces around the neck.🔽Vārāhī has one face and two hands.

original: g-yas pa gri gug bandha g-yon //
analyzed: g-yas pa gri gug bandha g-yon //
translated: The right hand holds a flaying knife, and the left hand holds a skull cup.

original: gtso bo'i sku la 'khyud pa'i tshul //
analyzed: gtso bo'i sku la 'khyud pa'i tshul //
translated: In the manner of embracing the body of the principal one.

original: gnyis su med pa'i gnas su bzhugs //
analyzed: gnyis su med pa'i gnas su bzhugs //
translated: They dwell in the state of nonduality.🔽The six sense powers, such as the eyes and body,

original: mig dang lus sogs dbang po drug / sangs rgyas drug kyang yod par bsam //
analyzed: mig dang lus sogs dbang po drug / sangs rgyas drug kyang yod par bsam //
translated: Are also the six buddhas.

original: sku gsung thugs kyang byin gyis brlab //
analyzed: sku gsung thugs kyang byin gyis brlab //
translated: Bless the body, speech, and mind.

original: snying ga'i h'um las 'od byung bas //
analyzed: snying ga'i h'um las 'od byung bas //
translated: Light rays come from the hūṃ in the heart.

original: ye shes mkha' 'gro spyan drangs la //
analyzed: ye shes mkha' 'gro spyan drangs la //
translated: The awareness dakinis are invited.

original: tshig gi dbang yang blang bar bya //
analyzed: tshig gi dbang yang blang bar bya //
translated: The word empowerment is also taken.

original: bcom ldan de bzhin gshegs pa kun //
analyzed: bcom ldan de bzhin gshegs pa kun //
translated: All bhagavān tathāgatas,

original: bcom ldan mnga' bdag chen po rnams ;
analyzed: bcom ldan mnga' bdag chen po rnams ;
translated: Bhagavān great lords,

original: / khyed kyis bdag la dbang bskur stsol //
analyzed: / khyed kyis bdag la dbang bskur stsol //
translated: Please grant me the empowerment.

original: de skad bdag gis dbang blangs pas //
analyzed: de skad bdag gis dbang blangs pas //
translated: By saying that, I take the empowerment.

original: ye shes bdud rtsi'i chu rgyun gyis //
analyzed: ye shes bdud rtsi'i chu rgyun gyis //
translated: The stream of the elixir of awareness

original: bdag gi spyi bor dbang bskur bar //
analyzed: bdag gi spyi bor dbang bskur bar //
translated: Is conferred on my head.

original: rigs lnga cod pan gyur bar bsam //
analyzed: rigs lnga cod pan gyur bar bsam //
translated: I imagine the crowns of the five families.

original: mchod dang bstod dang bdud rtsi bza' //
analyzed: mchod dang bstod dang bdud rtsi bza' //
translated: Make offerings, praise, and eat the elixir.

original: rdo rje'i bzlas pa bya ba ste //
analyzed: rdo rje'i bzlas pa bya ba ste //
translated: Do the vajra recitation.

original: bzlas pa'i sngags ni 'di yin no //
analyzed: bzlas pa'i sngags ni 'di yin no //
translated: This is the mantra of the recitation.

original: aom hr'i: shtri: wi kri t'a na na h'um h'um phat phat sv'a h'a //
analyzed: aom hr'i: shtri: wi kri t'a na na h'um h'um phat phat sv'a h'a //
translated: Oṃ hṛiḥ śṛiḥ vikṛtānana hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ phaṭ svāhā.

original: thams cad grub pa'i don du bzlas //
analyzed: thams cad grub pa'i don du bzlas //
translated: Recite for the sake of accomplishing everything.

original: gtor ma'i sngags ni 'di yin no //
analyzed: gtor ma'i sngags ni 'di yin no //
translated: This is the mantra for the bali offering:

original: aom aa k'a ro mu kham sarba dharm'a n'am a'a dya nu ta panna tv'a ta aom a'a: h'um phat sv'a h'a /
analyzed: aom aa k'a ro mu kham sarba dharm'a n'am a'a dya nu ta panna tv'a ta aom a'a: h'um phat sv'a h'a /
translated: Oṃ akāro mukhaṃ sarvadharmāṇāṃ ādyanutpannatvāta oṃ āḥ hūṃ phaṭ svāhā.

original: bar chad thams cad bsrung ba'i phyir //
analyzed: bar chad thams cad bsrung ba'i phyir //
translated: For the sake of protecting against all obstacles,

original: des ni gtor ma sbyin par bya //
analyzed: des ni gtor ma sbyin par bya //
translated: one should give the bali offering with this.

original: des ni @63a * //
analyzed: des ni @63a * //
translated: With this

original: bskyed pa'i rim pa'o //
analyzed: bskyed pa'i rim pa'o //
translated: is the stage of generation.

original: de nas rnal 'byor ngal bso bya //
analyzed: de nas rnal 'byor ngal bso bya //
translated: Then, the yogī should rest.

original: snying ga'i h'um gi 'od zer gyis //
analyzed: snying ga'i h'um gi 'od zer gyis //
translated: Light rays from the hūṃ at the heart

original: khams gsum ma lus kun la khyab //
analyzed: khams gsum ma lus kun la khyab //
translated: pervade the entire three realms.

original: kun kyang sangs rgyas sku ru gyur //
analyzed: kun kyang sangs rgyas sku ru gyur //
translated: All become the form of the Buddha.

original: gyur pa kun kyang bdag la bsdu //🔽bdag kyang h'um la bsdu byas la //
analyzed: gyur pa kun kyang bdag la bsdu // bdag kyang h'um la bsdu byas la //
translated: All that has become dissolves into oneself.🔽One also dissolves into the hūṃ.

original: h'um yang thig ler gyur par bsgom //
analyzed: h'um yang thig ler gyur par bsgom //
translated: The hūṃ is also meditated as becoming a bindu.

original: lhag ma'i rtog pa spangs pa ste //
analyzed: lhag ma'i rtog pa spangs pa ste //
translated: The remaining concepts are abandoned,

original: yang dag bde ba'i rnam pa'o //
analyzed: yang dag bde ba'i rnam pa'o //
translated: the form of true bliss.

original: phyag med zhal med kha dog med //
analyzed: phyag med zhal med kha dog med //
translated: Without hands, without a face, without color,

original: mchog tu dga' ba'i mtshan nyid do //
analyzed: mchog tu dga' ba'i mtshan nyid do //
translated: This is the characteristic of supreme joy.🔽By whatever merit I have gained

original: 'di byas bsod nams gang thob des //
analyzed: 'di byas bsod nams gang thob des //
translated: through doing this,🔽may all sentient beings become Buddhas.

original: sems can thams cad sangs rgyas shog / nag po zhal gsum phyag drug pa'i mdor bsdus pa'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so//
analyzed: sems can thams cad sangs rgyas shog / nag po zhal gsum phyag drug pa'i mdor bsdus pa'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so//
translated: The concise sādhana of Kṛṣṇa (Nīla) with three faces and six arms is complete.
